## Bundle.Convert.bundleStructure variable

Lightweight converter for bundle structure validation without full processing. Useful for detecting bundle files without the overhead of full validation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
bundleStructure: Converter<{
    metadata: IBundleMetadata;
    config: unknown;
    compiledCollection: unknown;
}>
```
